description: The Aconcagua Light hooded jacket can be worn as a mid-layer for mountaineering, climbing, ski touring or hiking. The high-quality material is lightweight, stretchable and pleasant to wear. An antimicrobial treatment using the chemical-free Livinguard® technology prevents the formation of unpleasant odors. This makes the Aconcagua Light easy-care, durable and environmentally friendly, as you won't need to wash it as often. The design of the pockets is tailored to the needs of mountain sports enthusiasts: allowing easy access at all times, even when wearing a backpack or climbing harness. A versatile and comfortable mid-layer hooded jacket.
name: Mammut Aconcagua Light ML Hooded Jacket - Mens
